title: Size Guide Measurements are off
content: Some Context: I have a few years experience in tight lacing/waist training with steel boned corsets. I wouldn‚Äôt consider these the proper waist trainers when wanting to displace the fat more dramatically, but these are helpful in other ways.. Since being a year postpartum I have been at my largest size and really uncomfortable with the excess weight in my abdomen that makes tightlacing a lot more uncomfortable to bend & move in.. so I opted for binding with these instead.. I‚Äôm using them as a support & smoothing aid while working on my weight loss.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: A few things to note- the measurements are off on the size guide. I ended up purchasing the 2XL & XL in 11.5inch torso length with the 25 ‚Äústeel‚Äù bones- which afforded me a little space so that my bra & shaper don‚Äôt rub. The 2XL fit on the first try without the extenders (My measurements are: Underbust 41inches, waist 37-39inches, 13inch torso, and 47inch hips at widest).. I make sure to wear maidenform shapewear comfort camisole underneath to protect both my skin and the shaper. I love that it‚Äôs very easy to bend & sit in which makes it comfortable to do 12 hour shifts in. The added support also helps with stomach bloat, anxiety, and portion control which is something that corsets aided with greatly.. Glad I get those features with this as well.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: After having my daughter 2 years ago I never got my body back. I actually gained a lot  while struggling with postpartum depression.  All this to say to say that I'm fat, but trying to start becoming less fat. Diet has helped me lose a ton already, but for the first time in my life my belly is bigger than my thighs. I realized a lot of it is posture and my abs having been "unzipped" while pregnant. Core exercises are really difficult at the moment because of my size and back pain from not having ab strength, it's a vicious cycle. I decided to try waist training to get a jump-start on getting my belly troubles fixed. Holy moly am I glad I did.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021

title: great
content: By the size chart I should have ordered a 7X or 8X. After reading tons of reviews and answered questions I went with a 5X. It is very tight. I've got back fat muffin top lol. But I'm not using this to look good in my clothes. I'm sculpting my body. I took about a week to get used to wearing it and working my way up to longer periods of time.

title: Verified Purchase

I usually wear it while doing my housework, gardening, or crafts. I can move, bend, sit - it's supportive without being restricting.

title: FINALLY FOUND THE TRUTH !!
content: Now THIS IS THE TRAINER I have been looking for!!! So y‚Äôall I have a 32 inch waist but I have an hourglass figure so i have a small waist compared to my hips. I got the XS because I‚Äôm on a weight loss journey and ddnt want to get a trainer that was too big that I wouldn‚Äôt be able to use after a while because it‚Äôs too large. I‚Äôm so happy I got the xs because I can work with it along my journey. I AM SO THANKFUL it comes with an extender because I definelty would not have been able to fit the XS without it. As my waist gets smaller I will be able to take off the extender and use the belt on its own and I‚Äôm so happy. The quality is amazing as well it really makes you sweat. I worked a GOOD sweat just putting the thing on! The material is awesome because it does not over stretch! It has enough give for you to get into it. I‚Äôve used other waist trainers that are made of spandex and polyester and after like a day or two I‚Äôm already on the last ring which I hated! If you are looking to use the product long term I recommend you size down from the recommendation especially since it comes with an extender. So happy I found this!

title: Absolutely Fantastic
content: I am so pleased with this trainer. I've owned many. And until recently I was a loyal Yianna waist trainer customer.  Crazy as it sounds, I'm allergic to latex. It's critically important that latex doesn't not touch my skin. After multiple births i needed a sturdy waist trainer to protect my middle from further injury. So, as I lost weight, i went through many Yianna waist trainers that had the polyester spandex outter cover,  cotton interior cover on it. Due to recent triple hernia belly repair and diastasis recti repair surgery, a sturdy waist trainer was again neccessary.  After trying to reorder through Yianna 3 times and receiving the wrong item (latex exposed,  I couldn't even open the package) and the company failing to send me the correct item,I turned to this company for a waist trainer with polyester spandex outter/cotton interior, latex middle layer. I AM SO HAPPY I DID!! Not only is this trainer more comfortable, I love that they send an additional panel extender so that customer can effectively aear the same trainer longer, and not having to order the next size down as quickly. Nothing but 5 stars for this company!! I'll never go back to the other brand. Choose this trainer! You won't be disappointed!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Let me start by saying wow. I‚Äôve seen the trend and never really given it much thought. Over the last year I‚Äôve lost 60 pounds and a friend recently turned me on to waist trainers. I researched and read reviews for 3 days straight. I found this one. I love it so far. It comes with an xtender so I purchased a size down. It fits but I have to use in largest setting on the extender however when I see progress and remove the extender (which will be a long time from now lol) I won‚Äôt have to purchase a smaller one. Good quality. Comfortable. My back fat does pop out at the top a little but other than that not really noticeable under comfort fitting clothing. I got the 25 steel bones for added posture support. Supports core really well and is flattering unless I wear a tight top.  I plan on wearing it everyday following a waist training schedule for 21 days when I leave in my vacation to Florida. Happy so far. Shipping was breeze and although I haven‚Äôt had to deal with customer service, the reviews give them 5 stars. It‚Äôs hard to get on though. Definitely do this before your makeup cause you‚Äôre gonna break a sweat getting into it. I fasten the bottom half way up pull over my hips (I have small hips) and tug at until I get it where I want it then I suck it  in or lay on bed and fasten the rest from bottom up. Makes it a little easier if you don‚Äôt have help or strong arms. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2‚Äù and weigh 140 lbs. waist now about 28-29. Hoping to get down to 26.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020

title: Omygosh!
content: I was hesitant at first due to the negative reviews. What drew me in was the extension. I have been having light back pain lately due to constantly sitting for long periods of time every day (school and work). I‚Äôm hoping this helps me from slouching as well. Another reason why I decided to buy this was to help me control my intake of food. I have been cooking more lately from being home a lot. I‚Äôm hoping the waist trainer would assist me in controlling how much I eat throughout the day. Over all the package arrived two days early. I would say the material of the waist trainer is a lot better than the other waist trainers I‚Äôve bought from the past and is the only one within the price range of 25 and under that does seem to support my back and provide much better comfort. The measurement is true to size. I‚Äôm about 5‚Äô6 and 155 pounds with a waist of 29. (I‚Äôm not skin tight skinny. I love food). I ordered a medium but I would recommend getting a size smaller if you are trying to lose weight or shape your waist which is what I was hoping to maybe do later down the road. The waist trainer fits comfortably on the first row without the extension. My fianc√© and I are planning on probably having a child sometime next year so I will not return the waist trainer for a smaller size because I do not want to wear this after giving birth if it is super tight (if all is good after it does happen I‚Äôll order a smaller one to waist train). I will post an update in a few months. I will plan to wear it for about 6-8 hours a day. I do run every once in a while (about 3x a week) when I have the time. Usually short runs. I hope this post helps.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: So like im happy for the extender came with it. Once i tried to put on the waist trainer, it wouldn‚Äôt fit. So i was going to return it and get another one up a size. I got an XL my usual size and i already ordered another XXL just incase the XL didn‚Äôt fit. But what i did to make it fit, i latch 2nd or 3rd bottom row and put it over my head and started doing the top row and went on down from there i missed like 2 latches in the process but its fine. The downside is the top 2 latches keep unlatching so i put it on the 3rd latch and it stop unlatching the struggle i went throughüôÉ but i still recommend going up a size to avoid going through all of this. But I will be wearing this quite often to look snatch thoüíÖ

title: Order a size or 2 smaller than what you measure
content: This is the second one I ordered.  The first was by my measurements which were 3 xl.. that was too big. So I returned and ordered this one in medium.  I should have ordered a large, but with the extender, this will work. It was really hard to clasp, I started from the top to the bottom. It hasnt rolled on me, but it does bulge at the top and the bottom. So if u have the extra baby fat, like me, just beware, it makes massive back rolls and a "sack" of fat at the bottom of your stomach from squeezing everything in. I covered both with sport bra and tucked into shorts. I see a bit of a difference in my shape tho, and I can feel the sweat dripping down my back. It IS visible in tight fitting clothes if anyone was thinking of wearing it in public.  If anything changes, I will update.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2020

title: LOVE THIS BUT‚Ä¶.
content: this product arrived BEFORE time. they do run large ladies. the returns are awesome so its a decent company. i didn't know they ran large so i had to send what i thought would be my size bacc. once i got that one i had to send it bacc it two was to large. my returns where THE NEXT DAY. as soon as i got it i was excited put it on right away to big sent it back either that day or the next day. so that could have had something to do with it as well- i don't know. now DOES IT WORK? i saw a difference in TWO dayz-no lie! i sleep with mine on. that way no one is aware of what i'm trying, i'm lying still so once its in the right place it stays there all night. i'm a real person/customer single mom full scheudle work, school, the mommy thing and this seemed "like a time saver" BUT still with results. good luck ladies, i've had this product for seven days now-no complaints. it does have extended length where it reaches down to your crotch area/pubic whatever you perfer to call it preventing that little pouch everyone warns about in those who are inexperienced with waist training. it also goes down to your lower back as well. nice quality no smell. packaged well and worth every penny. i will be ordering an additional one when this one becumz to big for me.
